subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Cincinnati Reds, no-hit by the Phillies’ Roy Halladay on Wednesday, can take heart from the 1956 Brooklyn Dodgers, who won after Don Larsen’s perfect game.
snippet: The Cincinnati Reds, no-hit by the Phillies’ Roy Halladay on Wednesday, can take heart from the 1956 Brooklyn Dodgers, who won after Don Larsen’s perfect game.
